Title: Le voci di dentro
Actors: Maria Angela Robustelli, Daghi Rondanini, Marcello Romolo
Plot: Alberto Saporito spent a very eventful night. His friend Aniello Amitrano was brutally killed and his body was hidden by his neighbors, the Cimmarutas. But he can't remember if it was just a dream or if he actually lived it. That'...
